title: Chemical Safety; Process Safety Management
headline: Learn about radioactivity, process safety management, as well as the importance of personal protective equipment.
description: This free online Chemical Safety; process safety management course will teach you about various case studies involving industrial disasters that have happened in history and how they affected the surroundings. You will also learn about an introduction to radioactivity, the definition of process safety management, and the importance of personal protective equipment along with the individual application for different parts of the human body.
courseDescription:
In this course, you will learn about various case studies around the operations of the Flixbourough petrochemical plant and how it was affected by the explosion. The safety measures and reactor configuration that led to the Seveso accident will also be covered in this course. Then, you will learn about the extent of the Chernobyl nuclear disaster, and the accident investigations surrounding the Bhopal gas tragedy.

Then, this course will teach you about radioactivity, as well as a definition of process safety management. You will also learn about the importance of personal protective equipment, and what type of personal protective equipment are used to protect various parts of the body. Lastly, you will learn about safety laws and regulations, and the effects of a nuclear disaster.

This course is helpful for learners who want to study in detail the extent of some of the industrial disasters that have happened in history, and how they affected the people and the environment. Learners can also understand the importance of process safety management in the workplace. Begin this course now to understand the importance of personal protective equipment and its applications.
